sourceMeaningMnemonic: There's a close-up of a <radical>leaf</radical> in a <radical>rice paddy</radical> inside of a <radical>box</radical>. Wait, it's not a box, this whole thing is just a <kanji>drawing</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Look closely at this box-shaped drawing. See each little stroke, smell the paper and the lead.
readingMnemonic: The drawing seems to have something else in the rice paddy, behind the leaf. You realize the drawing is actually of a <reading>ga</reading>rgoyle (<ja>が</ja>) and a <reading>cock</reading> (<ja>かく</ja>). You see the cock sitting on top of the gargoyle, crowing into the sky.
readingInfo: Picture the entire drawing. There's a cock sitting on a gargoyle, watching over this rice paddy. It's actually quite beautiful and idyllic.
